that a beacon has come 
into your range When requesting assistance, one of our employees will be alerted about your position and will meet you, so we ask you to wait in place and lift your device up.

That way we can find you more easily.

Warning: Due the size of the event area we may take a few minutes. As we approach you, our contributor will say the word :
NORTH NORTH EAST EAST SOUTH EAST SOUTH SOUTH WEST WEST NORTH WEST
Welcome to Veever 
Rock in Rio special edition.
